solution_line_template: The wallet costs ${wallet_more_than_food} more than the food, so it's ${food_cost} + ${wallet_more_than_food} = $<<{food_cost}+{wallet_more_than_food}={wallet_cost}>>{wallet_cost}.
So the cost of the shirt is {shirt_fraction} * ${wallet_cost} = $<<{shirt_fraction}*{wallet_cost}={shirt_cost}>>{shirt_cost}.
